definitions.definition: A religious student, especially in Turkey
definitions.example: 1896: The softas, concerning whose exploits we have heard so much of late, are the theological students who wish to become ulemas, or, literally, learned men. â€” Eliakim Littell and Robert S. Littell (1896), Living Age, volume 208, p. 330.

definitions.definition: (by extension) A fanatic adherent, blind follower
